title: 希望葱友可以一同幫港人把China變成牆內禁詞
contents:
就是港人的五大訴求的英文簡稱

- Completely withdraw extradition bill
- Holistic withdrawal of unjust charges
- Independent commission of inquiry
- No riot labelling
- Authentic universal suffrage

Make C.H.I.N.A. a censored word.

希望葱友可以好像上次甴近平發揚光大和玩出新花樣，嘗試把CHINA這英文字變成牆內禁詞
